meanings.definition: To dress or decorate in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She arrayed herself in a beautiful gown for the party.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers arrayed themselves in their uniforms for the parade.
meanings.sent3: He arrayed his pet in a tiny costume for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The garden was arrayed in a colorful display of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The room was arrayed with twinkling lights for the celebration.

meanings.definition: To set out in an orderly arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The books were arrayed neatly on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The students arrayed themselves in rows for the class photo.
meanings.sent3: She arrayed her toys in a perfect line on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The stars were arrayed across the night sky like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients were arrayed on the counter for the recipe.

meanings.definition: To display or exhibit in an impressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The museum arrayed the artifacts for the grand opening.
meanings.sent2: The chef arrayed the dishes beautifully on the table.
meanings.sent3: He arrayed his collection of stamps for all to see.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks arrayed across the sky in a dazzling show.
meanings.sent5: The jewels were arrayed in the display case like a treasure trove.
